Subject: Giant Post with OOC Issues

(Hey everyone! Sorry I didn't post on the weekend. My dad was hogging 
it, playing his war games. He thinks he's General Patton, it's crazy. 
I had about 300 messages to read, and I kinda sped through them so if 
some stuff is off than please correct me. Also I've got some OOC 
things to say. First off is the Ark. No where in my post did I say 
the Ark was destroyed. I only said that Savage was shooting 
fireblass, HOPING to destroy it. But it's too late now since it's 
been a factor for three days. The other is RYO D. I know you're into 
the Ninja Thing, and that's cool, I like it. But you've got these 
rules and facts the rest of us don't know. When I say Lance I mean 
Sword. It's the same thig to me. I know there was a back blast 
coming, and Prebon was prepared for it. I do things simple and 
without detail so that it's easier to understand. The Ninja Thing is 
cool, but  all those technicalities should be saved for a Ninja RPG.)

Vulois

Vulois woke up to see Battera staring at him. He remembered her from 
the base, and remembered he hit her. He looked around and saw they 
were in a cave, and wondered how he got here. He pulled out his gun 
and stuck it to her head.

"Where did you take me, filth?"
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream tracked down KitKat and walked into the DNA room, needing 
to speak with her.

"Listen KitKat, Arachnia is a fraud. You have to be carefull with 
this. I was talking to that mouse. When we found her, she was talking 
to Inferno. Now Inferno works for Megatron. But he told her to go and 
join Black Arachnia. Now why would Inferno tell a bot to join the 
enenmy? He wouldn't. He would tell a bot to join a group that had a 
treaty with Megatron. What if Black Arachnia really serves Megatron, 
and wants him to rule all Predacons? What if she's only joining us to 
send info on our decisions back to Megatron? Even worse, now that 
you've made the council, she could make sure we make the wrong 
decisions and fall into Megatrons trap? What if she costs us our 
freedom?"
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq watched the Ark be destroyed, all of their work with it.

"No..." said Brix, "Not now. Not after all that trouble going to the 
moon, Fliq almost dying, me killing Gekkidama to get those parts, ALL 
FOR NOTHING! NO!!!!!" Suddenly a large spark exploded in Brix's head. 
The extreme rage he experienced brought his other persona, Bronco, to 
a new level. It took control of everything, and wouldn't even let 
Brix stay in the back. Brix slowly fell into the depths of the sub-
consious, and died. Only Bronco remained, and now that he had full 
control, he could do what he wanted. Execpt it caused his own demise.
In his deranged state, he whipped his launcher around. When it was 
pointed at his feet, he fired, killing him instantly, and sending 
Fliq flying. Fliq crawled back to the lifeless body.

"Brix....no"

Fliq began to weep.

(When they came back from the moon, I kept thinking what new 
storyline I coud give them. I've been wanting to bring in a new char, 
but I wanted to even it out by killing one too. So now Brix is dead, 
and Fliq's story is the whole depression thing. He may even end up 
turning on the Maximals.)
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Tamron took most of the shots, tiny pockets of mech fluid started to 
seep through. He saw the great light rise in the sky, and knew it 
easily. He thought to himself:

Ultra Magnus. What a surprise! But there's no way we can stay here. 
There are too many opponents. But in destroying the Ark, we have been 
given an ace, and we will store it in our sleeve. As I have long 
suspected, Spears has been held at another Maximal Base. We will 
monitor these Maximals, and when they send a representitive to the 
base, we will track it's course and know where Spears is being held.

He called out loud:

"Slayer! Savage! Return to base! New plan!"

Tamron and Savage took off for the Trainer base.
